In just three and half years that’s “one-third the number of troops ever stationed in or around Vietnam during 15 years of that conflict!” > More surprising is the number of troops who have gone to war since 9/11, come back home, and then were redeployed to...

He suggested that the solution to concerns about sex and violence in the media isn’t more studies, or censorship, or even V-chips, but supporting quality programing on PBS. Crowley

Even though the new bankruptcy law will hit New Yorkers harder than the population as a whole, New York congressman Joseph Crowley was one of 73 Democrats who voted *for* the bill.
